ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I will give them more time. My strategy is sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I will just give them respite. My plan is certainly invincible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And (for this purpose) I will grant them respite. My design is incontrovertible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Though I have given them a respite, My plan against them is well established.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And I will give them respite; indeed My secret plan is extremely solid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I respite them; certainly My plan is strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I grant them respite; surely My scheme is effective.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and I respite them -- assuredly My guile is sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: I give them rein (for) lo! My scheme is strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For though I give them rein for a while, My strategy is sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I give them rein: verily My contrivance is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And I will grant them respite, for My devising is indeed sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Respite will I grant unto them: for My scheme is strong (and unfailing).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I respite them; certainly My Plan is strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and I respite them, My stratagem is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I will encourage them. My plan is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I will give them time. Indeed, my plan is firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:183] And I will respite them — assuredly My scheme is strong, powerful, and cannot be withstood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (I give them rein) I give them respite ((for) lo! My scheme is strong) My punishment and seizure is mighty.
